short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent binging on chess.com. Blocks chess.com if you lose too many games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enter your username and the number of losses.

Should losses equal your set threshold, access to chess.com/play/online and chess.com/game will be blocked.

If you come across any bugs or have any suggestions, please share them with me and Iâ€™ll do my best to fix them.

This extension is open source and can be found at: https://github.com/Zinkelburger/ChesscomBlocker/tree/main/Firefox
